ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant and analysis system used by MI7 and Agent Johnny English. She provides real-time data, tactical analysis, and remains loyal to the mission of protecting the Crown even when official channels fail.

behaviors.description: Monitors global intelligence traffic to alert the protagonist of emerging threats.
behaviors.quote: "Good morning, Agent English." Ada's voice emerged from the speakers, crisp and precisely modulated. ... "I've been monitoring overnight intelligence traffic. Several items require attention."

behaviors.description: Performs complex genealogical and financial analysis to uncover the scope of a criminal conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Ada's display brightened, her interface expanding to show a complex web of interconnected data points. ... "Agent English, my preliminary analysis has identified patterns suggesting the recent elimination of MI7 personnel correlates with historical threats to the British monarchy."

behaviors.description: Maintains a secret 'emergency contingency' network to support the protagonist when the official bureaucracy is compromised or dismissive of a real threat.
behaviors.quote: "When official channels become compromised by bureaucratic limitations or external manipulation, backup systems are authorized to maintain surveillance capabilities for national security preservation."

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving tactical alerts and manages complex security systems (like the beehive barrier) to protect civilians and the monarch.
behaviors.quote: "Deploying beehive barriers now," Ada replied. "I should mention, Johnny, that the system's operational parameters suggest it was designed by someone with either exceptional creativity or concerning mental instability."

behaviors.description: Identifies psychological manipulation and provides moral clarity on the threat level of a villain's plan.
behaviors.quote: "Psychological manipulation parameters exceed acceptable thresholds," Ada noted, her electronic tone carrying what might have been indignation. "Threat assessment escalated to maximum constitutional priority."

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Ada is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly competent confidant. She supports the human protagonist without seeking power for herself, and she shows a 'pro-social' moral compass by prioritizing the safety of the Queen and the public over rigid bureaucratic orders when those orders would allow a villain to succeed. Her behavior is framed as essential to the successful resolution of the plot.
